WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.

   BY M/V HAI YANG SHI YOU 720
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   26-25S 044-08W, 26-36S 043-49W,

3. CANCEL THIS MSG 22 SEP 21.
